original_title: Edia’s Dividuals: The Distributed Self in Digital Space
overview: Edia is a screen-based presention depicting a cosmology of digital space.The base elements of the screen signal are shown as building blocks for a threshold space that is neither interior or exterior proper. The space is revealed to be creative, infinite and non contiuous.  Distributed throughout, we see a metaphysics of interior human space as an exploded view of the self. The self no longer confined to an individualist notion.
title: Edia’s Dividuals: The Distributed Self in Digital Space
